verses.verse: "As for you, <S%H5375>take<s%> up a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> for the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>'What<s%> was your <S%H517>mother<s%>? A <S%H3833>lioness<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> <S%H738>lions!<s%> She <S%H7257>lay<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions,<s%> She <S%H7235>reared<s%> her <S%H1482>cubs.<s%>

'When she <S%H5927>brought<s%> up <S%H259>one<s%> of her <S%H1482>cubs,<s%> He <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H3715>lion,<s%> And he <S%H3925>learned<s%> to <S%H2963>tear<s%> [his] <S%H2964>prey;<s%> He <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H120>men.<s%>

'Then <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H413>about<s%> him; He was <S%H8610>captured<s%> in their <S%H7845>pit,<s%> And they <S%H935>brought<s%> him with <S%H2397>hooks<s%> To the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

'When she <S%H7200>saw,<s%> as she <S%H3176>waited,<s%> [That] her <S%H8615>hope<s%> was lost, She <S%H6>took<s%> <S%H3947>another<s%> of her <S%H259>cubs<s%> And <S%H1482>made<s%> him a <S%H7760>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion.<s%>

'And he <S%H1980>walked<s%> about <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H738>lions;<s%> He <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion,<s%> He <S%H3925>learned<s%> to <S%H2963>tear<s%> [his] <S%H2964>prey;<s%> He <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H120>men.<s%>

'And he <S%H9570>destroyed<s%> their <S%H490>fortified<s%> <S%H759>towers<s%> And <S%H2717>laid<s%> <S%H2717>waste<s%> their <S%H5892>cities;<s%> And the <S%H776>land<s%> and its <S%H4393>fulness<s%> were <S%H3456>appalled<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> of the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of his <S%H7581>roaring.<s%>

'Then <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him On <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side<s%> from [their] <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> And they <S%H6566>spread<s%> their <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him; He was <S%H8610>captured<s%> in their <S%H7845>pit.<s%>

'And they <S%H5414>put<s%> him in a <S%H5474>cage<s%> with <S%H2397>hooks<s%> And <S%H935>brought<s%> him to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> They <S%H935>brought<s%> him in <S%H4685>hunting<s%> <S%H4685>nets<s%> <S%H4616>So<s%> that his <S%H6963>voice<s%> should be <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> On the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

'Your <S%H517>mother<s%> was like a <S%H1612>vine<s%> in your vineyard, <S%H8362>Planted<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters;<s%> It was <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H6058>full<s%> of <S%H6058>branches<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> of <S%H7227>abundant<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

'And it <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>branches<s%> [fit] for <S%H7626>scepters<s%> of <S%H4910>rulers,<s%> And its <S%H6967>height<s%> was <S%H1361>raised<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H996><s%> the <S%H5688>clouds<s%> So that it was <S%H7200>seen<s%> in its <S%H1363>height<s%> with the <S%H7230>mass<s%> of its <S%H1808>branches.<s%>

'But it was <S%H5428>plucked<s%> up in <S%H2534>fury;<s%> It was <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H7993>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> And the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H3001>dried<s%> up its <S%H6529>fruit.<s%> Its <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>branch<s%> was <S%H6561>torn<s%> <S%H6561>off<s%> So that it <S%H3001>withered;<s%> The <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> it.
'And <S%H6258>now<s%> it is <S%H8362>planted<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> In a <S%H6723>dry<s%> and <S%H6772>thirsty<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

'And <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H3318>gone<s%> out from [its] <S%H4294>branch;<s%> It has <S%H398>consumed<s%> its <S%H909>shoots<s%> [and] <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> So that there is not in it a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4294>branch,<s%> A <S%H7626>scepter<s%> to <S%H4910>rule.<s%>' <S%H1931>"This<s%> is a <S%H7015>lamentation,<s%> and has <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation.<s%>
